title: Coming Soon: The Ranger Class
desc: The Ranger excells at combat from the 2nd Rank, striking before an attacker can close the distance. Learn more about this upcoming class addition!

title: An Introduction to Arcane Magic
desc: Sorcerers and Clerics begin with spells from Arcane Specialization: Arcane, a sorcery that specializes in sorcerous energy and force. Click to learn more about the magic these classes wield!

title: A Primer on Armor
desc: Unless you are a robe wearing sorcerer you most likely want to deck yourself out in some protective armor. Learn how the skill Armor-Training and your Might determine what you can wear.
